items.preText: Tamim Iqbal and Soumya Sarkar walking out. West Indies already on the field. Sheldon Cottrell has the ball. 2.57pm Right we're back live for Bangladesh's chase. They have a target that's considerably less than what they might have expected halfway through, but it will still take some discipline and application to get there. 2.31pm Meanwhile, the first qualifier for IPL 2019 is about to get underway. Hop on over to that game to find out who has won the toss, and what the playing XIs are.
items.text: oooh, play and a miss first up. Back of a length and good bounce outside off, Tamim has a waft at it
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: waaay down legside and he's lucky that's only one wide, because the keeper dived to his right to stop it
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: takes the outside edge that time, and it goes past the two slips to third man. Gets it to straighten and Tamim is caught half-cock pushing forward
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: gets it to tail into the batsman but it ends up on leg, and he's flicked it away to deep square
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length on the stumps, Tamim gets behind it and defends
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: very full on the fourth stump, Tamim takes a step forward and drives, but not timed well. Stopped by the in-field
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length, straighter, he comes on the front foot and pats it to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: around the wicket first up, given some width on a length outside off and he runs it down to third man
items.postText: Yoel: "When was the last time the two Bravos each played at the same time in different matches?" - Probably CPL?
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length, keeps it straight on middle and off, defended
items.postText: Tikolo: "who is keeping for the west indies?" - the centurion, Shai Hope
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: dropped by a diving Chase at cover. Invited the drive with his length, and Tamim stretched out for it outside off, but went uppish. Chase flew to his left but couldn't hold on
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: Around the wicket and he tucks him up, defended back
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length angling in, and good timing by Tamim. Just a punch, but it races across the turf and seems headed to the midwicket boundary, but is pulled back in at the last moment by Gabriel, who stops it with his foot. Dowrich has also run around and he throws it back
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 3 runs

items.text: back of a length into him, he rises up and pats it down towards backward short leg for a quick single
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Yoel: "They are both in the same team in CPL...." - ah you meant different matches. That is a query for our stats team then
items.text: tailing into him but wrong line, ends up on the pads and he's able to flick it with nice timing to the square leg boundary
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: similar ball, but straightens his line a mite, and it takes Sarkar's pad to short fine leg. Appeal, but that was going down
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length but on middle and leg, so he's able to tuck it to square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller length outside off, big stride forward and full face of the bat shown to pat the ball back
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, gets behind it and defends solidly
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: oooh, that was close to the off stump. A bit of a risky leave from Tamim, with Cottrell bowling the off-cutter that jagged back in from outside off
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: strays down leg with the angle from around the wicket, and that will be a wide
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: good length outside off, defended back
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length on the fourth stump line, he stays beside the ball and punches to point
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller length, angling in, and he pushes forward but it takes a thick inside edge to square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: angling into him again, ends up on the pads, and he flicks it, but can't go past mid-on
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and Tamim is happy to defend it to cover
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run
